{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3176815,"name":"BrianBurlingham","username":"Davie","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/b77776/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-03-30T01:33:32.258Z","cooked":"

I am new to Limelight as its my first year working on it so forgive me if there is something i am not seeing.
When i run the basic timed robot template code with the sample code from the limelight docs to get the network table values in Visual Studio and open the Frc Driverstation Dashboard the limelight camera feed does not appear nor does it appear as an available camera in the drop down menu.

Is there something specific i need to code so it would appear or is it an issue somewhere else?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2023-03-30T01:33:32.258Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":762,"reads":153,"readers_count":152,"score":3840.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":432351,"topic_slug":"limelight-not-appearing-in-frc-driver-station-dashboard","display_username":"BrianBurlingham","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":58419,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/limelight-not-appearing-in-frc-driver-station-dashboard/432351/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3176962,"name":"","username":"manso","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/e99b99/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-03-30T09:29:05.398Z","cooked":"

after opening SmartDashboard you must add a CameraServer stream to see the video feed from the limelight. You can do this by clicking on “View” on the top-right, then “Add…” then “CameraServer Stream Viewer”, you should see a video feed of your limelight on SmartDashboard now.

If you can’t see the video feed from the limelight, then right click on the box that appears and edit it so that it displays a video feed from the limelight.

What Limelight version are you using? There was a fix for camera streaming a month ago or so.
